page.title: 12Housing in Farington
page.content:
The housing is very mixed in the Farington area. There is a large modern estate to the west of the area built in the l960s. It consists of 2 or 3 bedroomed semidetached house and bungalows predominately privately owned. A similar development has been built to the east just off the Croston Road.
The rest of the housing is, on the whole, built along the two major roads being either prewar semi and detached houses or Victorian terraced. These terraced houses have been modernised under government grant schemes providing bathrooms and central heating. There are no gardens at the front and only enclosed yards at the rear with communal access.
